verses.verse: And He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> by the <S%G2281>sea.<s%> And such a <S%G4183>very<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> to Him that He <S%G1684>got<s%> into a <S%G4143>boat<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G2521>down;<s%> and the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was by the <S%G2281>sea<s%> on the <S%G1093>land.<s%>
And He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> them <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> and was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them in His <S%G1322>teaching,<s%>
<S%G191>"Listen<s%> [to this]! <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G4687>sow;<s%>

and it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that as he was <S%G4687>sowing,<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> [seed] <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G3844>beside<s%> the <S%G3598>road,<s%> and the <S%G4071>birds<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2719>ate<s%> it up.

"And <S%G243>other<s%> [seed] <S%G4098>fell<s%> on the <S%G4075>rocky<s%> [ground] <S%G3699>where<s%> it did not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1093>soil;<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> it <S%G1816>sprang<s%> up <S%G1223>because<s%> it <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G899>depth<s%> of <S%G1093>soil.<s%>

"And <S%G3753>after<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> had <S%G393>risen,<s%> it was <S%G2739>scorched;<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> it <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4491>root,<s%> it <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G3583>away.<s%>

"And <S%G243>other<s%> [seed] <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G173>thorns,<s%> and the <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G305>came<s%> up and <S%G4846>choked<s%> it, and it <S%G1325>yielded<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2590>crop.<s%>

"And <S%G243>other<s%> [seeds] <S%G4098>fell<s%> into the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>soil<s%> and as they <S%G305>grew<s%> up and <S%G837>increased,<s%> they <S%G1325>yielded<s%> a <S%G2590>crop<s%> and <S%G5342>produced<s%> <S%G5144>thirty,<s%> <S%G1835>sixty,<s%> and a <S%G1540>hundredfold.<s%>"
And He was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>"

And as <S%G3753>soon<s%> as He was <S%G3441>alone,<s%> His <S%G3588>followers,<s%> <S%G4012><s%> <S%G4862>along<s%> with the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> [began] <S%G2065>asking<s%> Him [about] the <S%G3850>parables.<s%>

And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "To you has been <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> but <S%G1565>those<s%> who are <S%G1854>outside<s%> <S%G1096>get<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> in <S%G3850>parables,<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that while <S%G991>seeing,<s%> they may <S%G991>see<s%> and not <S%G3708>perceive;<s%> and while <S%G191>hearing,<s%> they may <S%G191>hear<s%> and not <S%G4920>understand<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> they <S%G1994>return<s%> and be <S%G863>forgiven.<s%> "

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do you not <S%G3609>understand<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%>? And <S%G4459>how<s%> will you <S%G1097>understand<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3850>parables<s%>?
"The <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G4687>sows<s%> the <S%G3056>word.<s%>

"And <S%G3778>these<s%> are the ones <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G3844>beside<s%> the <S%G3598>road<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> is <S%G4687>sown;<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> and <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> which has been <S%G4687>sown<s%> in them.

"And in a <S%G3668>similar<s%> <S%G3668>way<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are the ones on whom seed was <S%G4687>sown<s%> on the <S%G4075>rocky<s%> [places,] <S%G3739>who,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> it with <S%G5479>joy;<s%>

and they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> [firm] <S%G4491>root<s%> in <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> but are [only] <S%G4340>temporary;<s%> <S%G1534>then,<s%> when <S%G2347>affliction<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1375>persecution<s%> <S%G1096>arises<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> they <S%G4624>fall<s%> <S%G4624>away.<s%>
"And <S%G243>others<s%> are the ones on whom seed was <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G173>thorns;<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are the ones who have <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%>

and the <S%G3308>worries<s%> of the <S%G165>world,<s%> and the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G4149>riches,<s%> and the <S%G1939>desires<s%> for <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G3062>things<s%> <S%G1531>enter<s%> in and <S%G4846>choke<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and it <S%G1096>becomes<s%> <S%G175>unfruitful.<s%>

"And <S%G1565>those<s%> are the ones on whom seed was <S%G4687>sown<s%> on the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>soil;<s%> and they <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> and <S%G3858>accept<s%> it, and <S%G2592>bear<s%> <S%G2592>fruit,<s%> <S%G5144>thirty,<s%> <S%G1835>sixty,<s%> and a <S%G1540>hundredfold.<s%>"

And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "A <S%G3088>lamp<s%> is not <S%G2064>brought<s%> to be <S%G5087>put<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a peck-measure, is it, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> a <S%G2825>bed<s%>? Is it not [brought] to be <S%G5087>put<s%> on the <S%G3087>lampstand<s%>?

"For <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> is <S%G2927>hidden,<s%> <S%G1437>except<s%> to be <S%G5319>revealed;<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> has [anything] <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G614>secret,<s%> but that it should <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G5318>light.<s%>
<S%G1487>"If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>"

And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G991>"Take<s%> <S%G991>care<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you <S%G191>listen<s%> to. By your <S%G3358>standard<s%> of <S%G3354>measure<s%> it shall be <S%G3354>measured<s%> to you; and <S%G4369>more<s%> shall be <S%G4369>given<s%> you <S%G4369>besides.<s%>

"For <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G2192>has,<s%> to him shall [more] be <S%G1325>given;<s%> and <S%G3739>whoever<s%> does not <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from him."
And He was <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G5613><s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G906>casts<s%> <S%G4703>seed<s%> upon the <S%G1093>soil;<s%>

and <S%G2518>goes<s%> to <S%G2518>bed<s%> at <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G1453>gets<s%> up by <S%G2250>day,<s%> and the <S%G4703>seed<s%> <S%G985>sprouts<s%> up and <S%G3373>grows<s%> â€“ <S%G5613>how,<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> does not <S%G3609>know.<s%>

"The <S%G1093>soil<s%> <S%G2592>produces<s%> <S%G2592>crops<s%> by <S%G844>itself;<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> the <S%G5528>blade,<s%> <S%G7508>then<s%> the <S%G4719>head,<s%> <S%G7508>then<s%> the <S%G4134>mature<s%> <S%G4621>grain<s%> in the <S%G4719>head.<s%>

"But <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G2590>crop<s%> <S%G3860>permits,<s%> he <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G649>puts<s%> in the <S%G1407>sickle,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> has <S%G3936>come.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> shall we <S%G3666>picture<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> by <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> shall we <S%G5087>present<s%> it?

"[It is] <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4615>mustard<s%> <S%G2848>seed,<s%> <S%G3739>which,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G4687>sown<s%> upon the <S%G1093>soil,<s%> though it is <S%G3398>smaller<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4690>seeds<s%> that are upon the <S%G1093>soil,<s%>

<S%G2532>yet<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> it is <S%G4687>sown,<s%> <S%G305>grows<s%> up and <S%G1096>becomes<s%> <S%G3173>larger<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3001>garden<s%> <S%G3001>plants<s%> and <S%G4160>forms<s%> <S%G3173>large<s%> <S%G2798>branches;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2681>nest<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> its <S%G4639>shade.<s%> "
And with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3850>parables<s%> He was <S%G2980>speaking<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> to them as they were <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> it;

and He did not <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G3850>parable;<s%> but He was <S%G1956>explaining<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2596>privately<s%> <S%G2398><s%> to His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
And on that <S%G2250>day,<s%> when <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Let us <S%G1330>go<s%> <S%G1330>over<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side.<s%>"

And <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> they <S%G3880>took<s%> Him <S%G3880>along<s%> with them, <S%G5613>just<s%> as He was, in the <S%G4143>boat;<s%> and <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4143>boats<s%> were with Him.

And there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>fierce<s%> <S%G2978>gale<s%> of <S%G417>wind,<s%> and the <S%G2949>waves<s%> were <S%G1911>breaking<s%> <S%G1911>over<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> much that the <S%G4143>boat<s%> was <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1072>filling<s%> up.

And He <S%G846>Himself<s%> was in the <S%G4403>stern,<s%> <S%G2518>asleep<s%> on the <S%G4344>cushion;<s%> and they <S%G1453>awoke<s%> Him and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> do You not <S%G3199>care<s%> that we are <S%G622>perishing<s%>?"

And being <S%G1326>aroused,<s%> He <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G4623>"Hush,<s%> be <S%G5392>still.<s%>" And the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>died<s%> <S%G2869>down<s%> and it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3173>perfectly<s%> <S%G1055>calm.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1169>timid<s%>? <S%G4459>How<s%> is it that you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>?"

And they became <S%G3173>very<s%> <S%G3173>much<s%> <S%G5399>afraid<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> and the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> Him?"
